name: Leg Strengthening Program for MCL and Meniscus Recovery
description: This workout plan is designed to strengthen the legs while being mindful of a healing MCL and a small meniscus tear. The focus is on controlled movements, stability, and gradual progression to prevent further injury.

movements.name: Leg Swings
movements.instructions: Stand on one leg and swing the other leg forward and backward. Keep the movement controlled.

movements.name: Bodyweight Squats
movements.instructions: Perform squats with your body weight, focusing on form and control. Keep your knees aligned with your toes.

movements.name: Step-Ups
movements.instructions: Use a step or platform. Step up with one leg, then bring the other leg up. Step down and repeat.

movements.name: Calf Raises
movements.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Raise your heels off the ground, then lower them back down.

movements.name: Hamstring Stretch
movements.instructions: Sit on the ground with one leg extended. Reach for your toes and hold the stretch.

movements.name: Ankle Circles
movements.instructions: Rotate your ankles in circles to warm up the joints.

movements.name: Single-Leg Deadlifts
movements.instructions: Stand on one leg, bend at the hip, and extend the other leg behind you. Return to standing.

movements.name: Wall Sits
movements.instructions: Lean against a wall and slide down into a sitting position. Hold the position.

movements.name: Lateral Leg Raises
movements.instructions: Lie on your side and lift the top leg upwards. Keep the movement controlled.

movements.name: Quad Stretch
movements.instructions: Stand on one leg, pull the other foot towards your buttocks, and hold the stretch.

movements.name: Marching in Place
movements.instructions: Lift your knees high and march in place to warm up.

movements.name: Plank
movements.instructions: Hold a plank position, keeping your body straight and core engaged.

movements.name: Glute Bridges
movements.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent. Lift your hips towards the ceiling and squeeze your glutes.

movements.name: Seated Leg Extensions
movements.instructions: Sit on a chair and extend one leg out straight, then lower it back down.

movements.name: IT Band Stretch
movements.instructions: Cross one leg over the other and lean to the side to stretch the IT band.
